## Query.updateMany() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Based on the query, matched documents will be updated

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateMany(query: QueryExecutorUpdateQuery, payload: (param: DocumentType) => DocumentType, options?: QueryUpdateManyOptions): this;
```

</td><td>

Update query to find match


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

Callback to update the found document


</td></tr>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.updateMany({ $key: keyRange }, newDoc, options);
```
